alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central El Paso County; Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Salt Basin; Southern Hudspeth Highlands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 10 at 2:37AM CST until January 12 at 1:00AM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THURSDAY TO MIDNIGHT MST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest New Mexico and southwest Texas. * WHEN...From 10 AM Thursday to midnight MST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust may reduce visibility along the International Border and near known dust sources.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central El Paso County; Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso, Western Hudspeth Counties; Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Salt Basin; Southern Hudspeth Highlands
